title: Bloomberg's Konolige on NY Approving Nuclear Subsidies (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg's Konolige on NY Approving Nuclear Subsidies (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Kit Konolige, Senior Industry Analyst for Bloomberg Intelligence, on NY regulators approving nuclear subsidies, and mandating 50% of the state’s electricity to come from renewable energy sources by 2030.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
